thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Surgery Partners Inc. Announces Q4 Loss Per Share $1.64

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Surgery Partners Inc. Announces Q4 Loss Per Share $1.64
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Surgery Partners Inc:
* SURGERY PARTNERS, INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 SAME STORE SALES ROSE 1.6 PERCENT * QTRLY SAME-FACILITY REVENUES INCREASED 1.6% TO $492.8 MILLION
* QTRLY RESULTS INCLUDE A NET NON-CASH CHARGE OF $38.7 MILLION RELATED TO ESTIMATED IMPACT OF TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $425.7 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY ADJUSTED LOSS PER SHARE $1.39 Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
